content:
Yes, there are many popular European destinations that are often served by Gatwick Airport. Some of the most popular ones include:

- Barcelona, Spain
- Amsterdam, Netherlands
- Dublin, Ireland
- Paris, France
- Rome, Italy
- Malaga, Spain
- Alicante, Spain
- Geneva, Switzerland
- Faro, Portugal
- Tenerife, Spain

Keep in mind that these destinations may vary depending on the current travel trends and season.
